Christopher Emmanuel Paul ▪ Twitter: CP3 ▪ Instagram: cp3

(CP3, The Point God, The Skate Instructor)

Position: Point Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-0, 175lb (183cm, 79kg)

Born: May 6, 1985 in Winston-Salem, North Carolina us

College: Wake Forest

High School: West Forsyth in Clemmons, North Carolina

Recruiting Rank: 2003 (6)

Draft: New Orleans Hornets, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2005 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 1, 2005

Experience: 18 years

Transactions

June 28, 2005: Drafted by the New Orleans Hornets in the 1st round (4th pick) of the 2005 NBA Draft.

December 14, 2011: Traded by the New Orleans Hornets with $350K cash and a 2015 2nd round draft pick (Artūras Gudaitis was later selected) to the Los Angeles Clippers for Al-Farouq Aminu, Eric Gordon, Chris Kaman and a 2012 1st round draft pick (Austin Rivers was later selected).

July 10, 2013: Signed a contract with the Los Angeles Clippers.

June 28, 2017: Traded by the Los Angeles Clippers to the Houston Rockets for Patrick Beverley, Sam Dekker, Montrezl Harrell, Darrun Hilliard, DeAndre Liggins, Lou Williams, Kyle Wiltjer, $661k cash and a 2018 1st round draft pick (Omari Spellman was later selected).

July 7, 2018: Signed as a free agent with the Houston Rockets.

October 21, 2018: Suspended by the league. (2-game suspension)

July 16, 2019: Traded by the Houston Rockets with a 2021 1st round draft pick, a 2024 1st round draft pick, a 2025 1st round draft pick and a 2026 1st round draft pick to the Oklahoma City Thunder for Russell Westbrook. 2024 pick is top-4 protected 2026 pick is top-4 protected, becomes $1MM and 2026 second-round pick 2021 1st-rd pick is right to swap, top-4 protected, did not convey 2025 1st-rd pick is right to swap with HOU, top-20 protected

November 16, 2020: Traded by the Oklahoma City Thunder with Abdel Nader to the Phoenix Suns for Ty Jerome, Jalen Lecque, Kelly Oubre Jr., Ricky Rubio and a 2022 1st round draft pick (Peyton Watson was later selected). 2022 1st-rd pick is PHO own

August 6, 2021: Signed a multi-year contract with the Phoenix Suns.

June 23, 2023: As part of a 3-team trade, traded by the Phoenix Suns with cash, Landry Shamet, a 2024 1st round draft pick ( was later selected), a 2024 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected), a 2025 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected), a 2026 1st round draft pick ( was later selected), a 2026 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected), a 2027 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected), a 2028 1st round draft pick ( was later selected), a 2030 1st round draft pick ( was later selected) and a 2030 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected) to the Washington Wizards; the Indiana Pacers traded Bilal Coulibaly to the Washington Wizards; the Phoenix Suns traded a 2028 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected) to the Indiana Pacers; the Washington Wizards traded Jarace Walker and a 2029 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected) to the Indiana Pacers; and the Washington Wizards traded Bradley Beal, Jordan Goodwin and Isaiah Todd to the Phoenix Suns. 2024 1st-rd pick is a right to swap 2026 1st-rd pick is a right to swap 2028 1st-rd pick is a right to swap 2030 1st-rd pick is a right to swap Teams also received trade exceptions

July 6, 2023: Traded by the Washington Wizards to the Golden State Warriors for Patrick Baldwin Jr., Jordan Poole, Ryan Rollins, a 2027 2nd round draft pick ( was later selected) and a 2030 1st round draft pick ( was later selected). 2027 2nd-rd pick is GSW own 2030 1st-rd pick is GSW own

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Chris Paul?

Chris Paul is 38 years old.

Where was Chris Paul born?

Chris Paul was born in Winston-Salem, North Carolina.

When was Chris Paul born?

Chris Paul was born on May 6, 1985.

How tall is Chris Paul?

Chris Paul is 6-0 (183 cm) tall.

How much does Chris Paul weigh?

Chris Paul weighs 175 lbs (79 kg).

Is Chris Paul in the Hall of Fame?

Chris Paul is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Chris Paul drafted?

Chris Paul was drafted by New Orleans Hornets, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2005 NBA Draft.

What position does Chris Paul play?

Point Guard.

What is Chris Paul's net worth?

Chris Paul has made at least $359,707,923 playing professional basketball.

How much does Chris Paul make?

Chris Paul made $41,358,814 in 2021.

What does Chris Paul average?

Chris Paul averages 9.2 points, 3.9 rebounds, and 6.8 assists per game.

How many rings does Chris Paul have?

Chris Paul has won 0 championships.

What is Chris Paul's Twitter account?

What is Chris Paul's Instagram account?

What schools did Chris Paul attend?

Chris Paul attended West Forsyth in Clemmons, North Carolina and Wake Forest.
